brief_summary.textblock:
Toward personalised treatment in early metastatic prostate cancer based on the assessment of
      biomarkers in cancer tissue samples and circulating tumour cells.

clinical_study.brief_title: Prostate Cancer Evaluation of TaRgets in Genito Urinary Screening Program
clinical_study.condition: Metastatic Castration Resistant Prostate Cancer Patients

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Prostate Cancer patients

          -  Castration Resistant

          -  Prostatic tissue available

          -  Metastasis which may be biopsied

        Exclusion Criteria:

clinical_study.official_title: Prostate Cancer Evaluation of TaRgets in Genito Urinary Screening Program

oversight_info.authority: France: Agence Nationale de Sécurité du Médicament et des produits de santé

primary_outcome.description: success to evaluate at least one molecular analysis in tumor tissues (prostate and/or metastatic site) AND in CTC
primary_outcome.time_frame: assessed at the end of recruitment, up to 2 years

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.source: Gustave Roussy, Cancer Campus, Grand Paris

lead_sponsor.agency: Gustave Roussy, Cancer Campus, Grand Paris

clinical_study.study_design: Endpoint Classification: Bio-availability Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Diagnostic
